# PUT /organizations/{id}

> **Operation ID:** `updateOrganization`
> **Tags:** `Organizations`

## Update an organization

Updates the properties of an organization.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | In | Required | Description |
|------|------|-------|----------|-------------|
| `id` | integer | path | Yes | The ID of the organization |
